citations.narrative:
The ducks' and swans' winter enclosure did not have an area to wade/swim. Access to a pool/aquatic area is a special
space requirement for wading and aquatic birds and helps permit species typical-behavior. Ensure that the duck and
swan winter housing has an aquatic area that allows each bird to make normal postural and social adjustments.
Correct by February 1, 2026.

citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Birds at the facility were housed in appropriate environments, however a written plan for environmental enhancement for
birds' psychological well-being was not available for inspection. A plan for environmental enhancement to meet birds'
environmental and social needs is important to ensure each birds' wellbeing in the area they are housed. Ensure that a
plan is developed with and approved by the attending veterinarian for the bird species housed at the facility.
***Correct by March 2, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.153(c) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
The ducks' and swans' winter enclosure did not have an area to wade/swim. Access to a pool/aquatic area is a special 
space requirement for wading and aquatic birds and helps permit species typical-behavior. Ensure that the duck and 
swan winter housing has an aquatic area that allows each bird to make normal postural and social adjustments. 
Correct by February 1, 2026. 
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Birds at the facility were housed in appropriate environments, however a written plan for environmental enhancement for 
birds' psychological well-being was not available for inspection. A plan for environmental enhancement to meet birds' 
environmental and social needs is important to ensure each birds' wellbeing in the area they are housed. Ensure that a 
plan is developed with and approved by the attending veterinarian for the bird species housed at the facility.  
***Correct by March 2, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
